docs.title: Welcome to the Blueprint docs
docs.text:
Blueprints are customizable workflows that help developers build AI applications using open-source tools and models

These docs are your companion to mastering this Blueprint.

docs.title: Start building the Blueprint in minutes:
docs.text: • Getting Started: Quick setup and installation instructions.

docs.title: Dive deeper into how the Blueprint works:
docs.text:
• Step-by-Step Guide: A detailed breakdown of the system’s design and workflow.
  • API Reference: Explore the technical details of the core modules.

docs.title: Customize the Blueprint to fit your needs:
docs.text: • Customization Guide: Tailor project parameters to fit your needs

docs.title: Help shape the future of Blueprints:
docs.text:
• Future Features & Contributions: Learn about exciting upcoming features and how to contribute to the project.

Have more questions? Reach out to us on Discord and we'll see how we can help:

docs.title: Why Blueprints?
docs.text: Blueprints are more than starter code—they’re your gateway to building AI-powered solutions with confidence. With step-by-step guidance, modular design, and open-source tools, we make AI accessible for developers of all skill levels.

docs.title: 🎨 Customization Guide
docs.text: This Blueprint is designed to be flexible and easily adaptable to your specific needs. This guide will walk you through some key areas you can customize to make the Blueprint your own.

docs.title: 🤝 Contributing to the Blueprint
docs.text: Want to help improve or extend this Blueprint? Check out the Future Features & Contributions Guide to see how you can contribute your ideas, code, or feedback to make this Blueprint even better!

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: Get started with this Blueprint using one of the options below:

docs.title: Step-by-Step Guide: How this Blueprint Works
🎨 Customizing the Blueprint
docs.text: To better understand how you can tailor this Blueprint to suit your specific needs, please visit the Customization Guide.

docs.title: 🤝 Contributing to the Blueprint
docs.text: Want to help improve or extend this Blueprint? Check out the Future Features & Contributions Guide to see how you can contribute your ideas, code, or feedback to make this Blueprint even better!
